Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: the professor was more straight to the point and kept in mind the context and their experience and helped me see through my own limitations. AI gives vague feedback and it is always with gloves

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: from professor made me feel more motivated to change. AI made me more reflective
